text: Domenico Centurioni (born 26 October 1940) is an Italian wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman 52 kg at the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Italy Category:Wrestlers at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Rome
title: Domenico Centurioni
